title: Bronze plate mail
data:
**[English]()** • [中文（中国大陆）‎](/wiki/Bronze_plate_mail/zh-CN "Bronze plate mail/zh-CN")

| \[   bronze plate mail   [![Bronze plate mail.png](/images/3/30/Bronze_plate_mail.png)](/wiki/File:Bronze_plate_mail.png) |                                                        |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| Appearance                                                                                                                | bronze plate mail                                      |
|                                                                                                                           |                                                        |
| Slot                                                                                                                      | [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor")            |
| AC                                                                                                                        | [6](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")                   |
| Special                                                                                                                   | - [MC1](/wiki/Magic_cancellation "Magic cancellation") |
|                                                                                                                           |                                                        |
| Base price                                                                                                                | 400 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                      |
| Weight                                                                                                                    | [450](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                           |
| Material                                                                                                                  | [copper](/wiki/Copper "Copper")                        |

**Bronze plate mail** is a type of [body armor](/wiki/Body_armor "Body armor") that appears in *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*. It is made of [copper](/wiki/Copper "Copper").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Description](#Description)

- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [4 History](#History)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.3 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [6 References](#References)

## Generation

In addition to random generation, general [stores](/wiki/Store "Store") and armor shops can stock bronze plate mail.

[Player monster](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") [barbarians](/wiki/Barbarian_\(player_monster\) "Barbarian (player monster)"), [knights](/wiki/Knight_\(player_monster\) "Knight (player monster)"), [priests](/wiki/Priest_\(player_monster\) "Priest (player monster)"), and [valkyries](/wiki/Valkyrie_\(player_monster\) "Valkyrie (player monster)") have an effective 5⁄124 chance (roughly \~4.03%) of forcing bronze plate mail in place of their initial body armor.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)

## Description

While worn, bronze plate mail provides 6 base [AC](/wiki/AC "AC") and [MC1](/wiki/MC1 "MC1").

## Strategy

Bronze plate mail offers 1 less base AC and a lower level of magic cancellation than standard [plate mail](/wiki/Plate_mail "Plate mail") for the same amount of [weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight"), with its only advantage being immunity to [erosion](/wiki/Erosion "Erosion") by rust (but not corrosion). A [dwarvish mithril-coat](/wiki/Dwarvish_mithril-coat "Dwarvish mithril-coat") offers the same AC along with MC2 for 1⁄3 of the weight, and an [elven mithril-coat](/wiki/Elven_mithril-coat "Elven mithril-coat") is still preferable for and similar protection and weight with 1 less point of AC.

## History

Bronze plate mail first appears in [NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d"). From this version to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"), including some variants based on those versions, bronze plate mail does not offer any [magic cancellation](/wiki/Magic_cancellation_\(3.4.3\) "Magic cancellation (3.4.3)").

## Variants

In variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") systems, bronze plate mail is usually removed, with plate mail made of copper providing much of the same characteristics, if not slightly improved ones.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), bronze plate mail does not confer any magic cancellation.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), bronze plate mail is phased out.

[Githyanki pirates](/wiki/Githyanki_pirate "Githyanki pirate") generate with plate mail made of bronze - the original [Pirate](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") patch that introduces them specifies bronze plate mail.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, githyanki pirates generate with bronze plate mail as in dNetHack.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 174](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L174): *1⁄2 for barbarians and other mentioned roles to get random body armor within the range of objects from plate mail to chain mail in objects.c, using normal generation odds*
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 201](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L201): *body armor for knights*
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 215](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L215): *body armor for priests*
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 242](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L242): *body armor for valkyries*

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.7. Click here for more information.")
html:
Bronze plate mail

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[   bronze plate mail  
Appearance bronze plate mail
Slot body armor
AC 6
Special
  • MC1
Base price 400 zm
Weight 450
Material copper

Bronze plate mail is a type of body armor that appears in NetHack. It is made of copper.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 History
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 dNetHack
    • 5.3 SlashTHEM
  • 6 References

Generation

In addition to random generation, general stores and armor shops can stock bronze plate mail.

Player monster barbarians, knights, priests, and valkyries have an effective 5⁄124 chance (roughly ~4.03%) of forcing bronze plate mail in place of their initial body armor.[1][2][3][4]

Description

While worn, bronze plate mail provides 6 base AC and MC1.

Strategy

Bronze plate mail offers 1 less base AC and a lower level of magic cancellation than standard plate mail for the same amount of weight, with its only advantage being immunity to erosion by rust (but not corrosion). A dwarvish mithril-coat offers the same AC along with MC2 for 1⁄3 of the weight, and an elven mithril-coat is still preferable for and similar protection and weight with 1 less point of AC.

History

Bronze plate mail first appears in NetHack 1.3d. From this version to NetHack 3.4.3, including some variants based on those versions, bronze plate mail does not offer any magic cancellation.

Variants

In variants with object materials systems, bronze plate mail is usually removed, with plate mail made of copper providing much of the same characteristics, if not slightly improved ones.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, bronze plate mail does not confer any magic cancellation.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, bronze plate mail is phased out.

Githyanki pirates generate with plate mail made of bronze - the original Pirate patch that introduces them specifies bronze plate mail.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, githyanki pirates generate with bronze plate mail as in dNetHack.

References

  1. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 174: 1⁄2 for barbarians and other mentioned roles to get random body armor within the range of objects from plate mail to chain mail in objects.c, using normal generation odds
  2. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 201: body armor for knights
  3. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 215: body armor for priests
  4. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 242: body armor for valkyries

It is made of [[copper]]. ==Generation== In addition to random generation, general [[store]]s and armor shops can stock bronze plate mail. [[Player monster]] [[Barbarian (player monster)|barbarians]], [[Knight (player monster)|knights]], [[Priest (player monster)|priests]], and [[Valkyrie (player monster)|valkyries]] have an effective {{frac|5|124}} chance (roughly ~4.03%) of forcing bronze plate mail in place of their initial body armor.{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|174|version=NetHack 3.6.7|comment={{frac|2}} for barbarians and other mentioned roles to get random body armor within the range of objects from plate mail to chain mail in objects.c, using normal generation odds}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|201|version=NetHack 3.6.7|comment=body armor for knights}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|215|version=NetHack 3.6.7|comment=body armor for priests}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|242|version=NetHack 3.6.7|comment=body armor for valkyries}} ==Description== While worn, bronze plate mail provides 6 base [[AC]] and [[MC1]]. ==Strategy== Bronze plate mail offers 1 less base AC and a lower level of magic cancellation than standard [[plate mail]] for the same amount of [[weight]], with its only advantage being immunity to [[erosion]] by rust (but not corrosion). A [[dwarvish mithril-coat]] offers the same AC along with MC2 for {{frac|3}} of the weight, and an [[elven mithril-coat]] is still preferable for and similar protection and weight with 1 less point of AC. ==History== Bronze plate mail first appears in [[NetHack 1.3d]]. From this version to [[NetHack 3.4.3]], including some variants based on those versions, bronze plate mail does not offer any [[Magic cancellation (3.4.3)|magic cancellation]]. ==Variants== In variants with [[object materials]] systems, bronze plate mail is usually removed, with plate mail made of copper providing much of the same characteristics, if not slightly improved ones. ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], bronze plate mail does not confer any magic cancellation. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], bronze plate mail is phased out. [[Githyanki pirate]]s generate with plate mail made of bronze - the original [[Pirate]] patch that introduces them specifies bronze plate mail. ===SlashTHEM=== In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, githyanki pirates generate with bronze plate mail as in dNetHack. ==References== {{nethack-367}} [[Category:Body armor]]
